description: Specifies a VPC flow log, which enables you to capture IP traffic for a specific network interface, subnet, or VPC.

Id.markdownDescription:
The Flow Log ID

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

DeliverLogsPermissionArn.description: The ARN for the IAM role that permits Amazon EC2 to publish flow logs to a CloudWatch Logs log group in your account. If you specify LogDestinationType as s3 or kinesis-data-firehose, do not specify DeliverLogsPermissionArn or LogGroupName.
DeliverLogsPermissionArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN for the IAM role that permits Amazon EC2 to publish flow logs to a CloudWatch Logs log group in your account. If you specify LogDestinationType as s3 or kinesis-data-firehose, do not specify DeliverLogsPermissionArn or LogGroupName.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

LogDestination.description: Specifies the destination to which the flow log data is to be published. Flow log data can be published to a CloudWatch Logs log group, an Amazon S3 bucket, or a Kinesis Firehose stream. The value specified for this parameter depends on the value specified for LogDestinationType.
LogDestination.markdownDescription:
Specifies the destination to which the flow log data is to be published. Flow log data can be published to a CloudWatch Logs log group, an Amazon S3 bucket, or a Kinesis Firehose stream. The value specified for this parameter depends on the value specified for LogDestinationType.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

LogDestinationType.description: Specifies the type of destination to which the flow log data is to be published. Flow log data can be published to CloudWatch Logs or Amazon S3.
LogDestinationType.markdownDescription:
Specifies the type of destination to which the flow log data is to be published. Flow log data can be published to CloudWatch Logs or Amazon S3.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

LogFormat.description: The fields to include in the flow log record, in the order in which they should appear.
LogFormat.markdownDescription:
The fields to include in the flow log record, in the order in which they should appear.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

LogGroupName.description: The name of a new or existing CloudWatch Logs log group where Amazon EC2 publishes your flow logs. If you specify LogDestinationType as s3 or kinesis-data-firehose, do not specify DeliverLogsPermissionArn or LogGroupName.
LogGroupName.markdownDescription:
The name of a new or existing CloudWatch Logs log group where Amazon EC2 publishes your flow logs. If you specify LogDestinationType as s3 or kinesis-data-firehose, do not specify DeliverLogsPermissionArn or LogGroupName.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

MaxAggregationInterval.description: The maximum interval of time during which a flow of packets is captured and aggregated into a flow log record. You can specify 60 seconds (1 minute) or 600 seconds (10 minutes).
MaxAggregationInterval.markdownDescription:
The maximum interval of time during which a flow of packets is captured and aggregated into a flow log record. You can specify 60 seconds (1 minute) or 600 seconds (10 minutes).

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

ResourceId.description: The ID of the subnet, network interface, or VPC for which you want to create a flow log.
ResourceId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the subnet, network interface, or VPC for which you want to create a flow log.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

ResourceType.description: The type of resource for which to create the flow log. For example, if you specified a VPC ID for the ResourceId property, specify VPC for this property.
ResourceType.markdownDescription:
The type of resource for which to create the flow log. For example, if you specified a VPC ID for the ResourceId property, specify VPC for this property.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: The tags to apply to the flow logs.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags to apply to the flow logs.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

TrafficType.description: The type of traffic to log. You can log traffic that the resource accepts or rejects, or all traffic.
TrafficType.markdownDescription:
The type of traffic to log. You can log traffic that the resource accepts or rejects, or all traffic.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption
